Class BigTwoDeck

  • java.lang.Object
    • CardList
      • Deck
        • BigTwoDeck

  • public class BigTwoDeck
extends Deck
    This class is used to model the a deck of cards used in a Big Two card game. This class is a subclass of the Deck class. It holds the Information of a Big Two card and overrides the initialize() method in order to create a deck of Big Two cards.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method if for initializing a deck of Big Two cards. It will remove all cards from the deck, create 52 Big two cards and add them to the deck.
        Overrides:
        initialize in class Deck
